name: Forever Spinning Go Kart Kid
description:
Keep spinning and don't get caught! 


Why

Made for the Kenney Game Jam. The theme is "rotation". I am so tired. but it's done and playable :)

If you had fun (or didn't) come say hi on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/FzQZeANkGu

Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Move - Left Stick on gamepad (untested)
Credits

Kenney for the beautiful assets and hosting this game jam.

Faraz Fiction for the royalty free music

Pärtel Lang and RootMotion for the Unity PuppetMaster asset

xCirrex2 for the inspirational video :)
